      • create

        public static BackgroundColor create(String fill,
                     String stroke,
                     int strokeWidth)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        fill - chart fill color, as an HTML color string
        stroke - color of the chart border, as an HTML color string.
        strokeWidth - border width, in pixels (default is 2).
        Returns:
        a new object instance
